page.title: 12Shopping Survey - Kirton
page.content:
We wanted to study the shopping habits of people who live in Kirton. We tested a sample of 48 shoppers and we found that 34 of them go to Boston for their main shopping and 26 of them travel there by car. Out of our survey 43 shoppers use the large Supermarkets in Boston. The shop in Kirton used most frequently was Jessops the bakers. Kirton has it's own shopping centre these are the shops.
Antique Shops (2) Post Office Bakers Garden Centre Banks (3) Greengrocers (3) Butchers Hardware Shop Chemist Library Co-Op Newsagent Cycle Shop Pet Shop Dress Shop Spar Store Fish Shop (2) Video Shops (2)
